test_item.title:
––––––– ABOUT DTM26 –––––––
    
When/Where: May 20–21, 2026, Berlin. 

Attendance: 3,000 of Europe’s leading Deep Tech innovators, including senior innovation leaders, founders and investors.

Tracks: Energy · Space · Defence · Manufacturing · Advanced Materials · Compute

Track record: €350M+ catalysed investments · 200+ commercial contracts triggered · 250+ partners · 15,000+ 1:1 meetings · 2,000+ founders · 45% C-level ·

Partners include Lakestar, NIF, Cherry, Elaia, HV Capital, Earlybird, Speedinvest, Techstars, Huawei, Bayer, Thales Alenia, Airbus, Deutsche Telekom, McKinsey & more.

Companies you can expect to see at DTM26 (Director level+)
A.P. Moller - Maersk | ABUS Kransysteme | Air Liquide | Airbus | Akkök Holding | Analog Devices | Arm | Avery Dennison | Axpo Group | Belden | Berlin Institute of Health at Charité (BIH) | Beumer | BLUE OCEAN | BMW Group | BMW Startup Garage | Bosch | Bosch Rexroth | Bosch Ventures | BSH | Builtech Holding GmbH | DB Energie | DeepTechXL | Deutsche Energie-Agentur GmbH (DENA) | Deutsche Telekom | DÖRKEN Digital Ventures GmbH | EEW Energy from Waste | Electrolux | enercity | Equinor ASA | Fidelity Investments | Fiege Ventures | FirstGroup plc | Forvia Hella | GEA | GE Healthcare | Giesecke+Devrient | Google Cloud | Hansgrohe SE | HelloFresh | Hellmann Worldwide Logistics | Henkel | Hensoldt | Hitachi Ventures | hte | HÜBNER Group | Husqvarna Group | Hyundai | IBM | imec | IONOS | Kearney | Kayser | Klockner Pentaplast | Koenig Bauer | KPN Ventures | LG Future Home | Linde | Lufthansa Innovation Hub | Lufthansa Technik | Matthews Engineering | mda space | Merck Healthcare | Millog | Motor Oil | NEEW Ventures | Nokia | Nordea Danmark | Novartis | Octopus Energy | Octopus Ventures | OHB | Ormazabal | OTTO GmbH & Co KG | Otto Krahn Group New Business | Ottobock | Picnic NL | Porsche Ventures | Procter Gamble | PTT Global Chemical Public Company Limited | REWE Group | RENK Group | Rehau | RHI | Rheinmetall | Rohde & Schwarz | Safran | Samsung NEXT | SAP | SARIA | Sartorius AG | Saudi Aramco Entrepreneurship Ventures | SCHUNK | Schott | Siemens | Siemens Energy | SIG | Sika | Space Faculty | Starlab - A New-Era Space Destination | ST Engineering Ventures | STIHL | Sungrow | Telefónica Germany | Terma | TGW Logistics Ventures | Thales Alenia Space | Toll Collect GmbH | Trianel | Trumpf | Turkish Airlines | Volkswagen Group | Wayra | Westlake

North Star: By 2030, mobilise €100B in Deep Tech capital and 10,000 partnerships - securing Europe’s technological sovereignty.
